sourcesContent:
import { Container, BreadcrumbItem, Row, Col, Breadcrumb, Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardImg, CardBody, CardFooter, Button, Form, FormInput, FormGroup, Collapse, Badge } from "shards-react"; import Collapsible from "react-collapsible"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabContent } from "react-bootstrap"; import uuidv4 from "uuid"; import Head from "next/head"; import ListeningLayout from "../../listening-components/ListeningLayout"; // Layout import Layout from "../../components/Layout"; import SEO from "react-seo-component"; const numberOfQuestions = 6; var today = new Date(); var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, "0"); var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, "0"); //January is 0! var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); today = mm + "/" + dd + "/" + yyyy; console.log(today); const MeetNick = props => ( Home Listening Exercises Meet Nick Meet Nick

Meet Nick, Ana's{" "} husband. In this listening exercise we'll get to know a little about him. Listen to the audio below and answer the{" "} {numberOfQuestions} questions.




Questions
  • Is Nick also from the US?}>

    Yes.
  • What is Nick's occupation?} >

    Nick is an English teacher.{" "}

  • How old is he?}>

    He is 27 years old.

  • What is the name of his dog?} >

    His dog's name is Joey.
  • How long has Nick been studying Spanish. } >

    He has been studying Spanish for 8 years.{" "}

  • Why does he like studying Spanish?} >

    He has always liked languages and words, and he believes that being able to talk with another group of people i sgratifying and very beneficial.

); export default MeetNick;
